DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 1 , single-dose study conduct adult female subject ( N = 16 ) general good health select participation study accord selection criterion . This study assess effect food pharmacokinetics PT2385 Tablets . The study consist two period conduct crossover fashion .
DOC.brief_title: PT2385-102 Food Effect Study PT2385 Healthy Volunteers

DOC.criteria: Female 18 45 year age ; If childbearing potential , willing practice method birth control ; If childbearing potential , must nonpregnant nonlactating negative serum pregnancy test result prior enrollment trial ; Has body mass index ( BMI ) 19 32 kg/m2 ; Willing able give write informed consent study participation provide consent access medical data ; Willing able cooperate aspect protocol . Any vaccination within 30 day start study throughout study ; Use need systemic drug ( ) include vitamin herbal preparation drug use contraception , within 30 day entry study study ; Use aspirin , nonsteroidal antiinflammatory agent , acetaminophen within 5 day prior ingestion study drug ; Donation receipt blood blood component within 4 week prior start study ; Any diagnostic intervention procedure require contrast agent within 30 day prior start study participation ; Abnormal blood pressure pulse rate ; Abnormal screen electrocardiogram ( ECG ) ; Use tobacco nicotinecontaining product ( e.g. , cigarette , cigar , chew tobacco , snuff , etc . ) ; Consumption alcohol xanthinecontaining product ; Consumption grapefruit , star fruit , Seville oranges , product contain ingredient ; Receipt investigational agent within 30 day ; A positive history drug abuse positive test result drug ( ) abuse ; Female subject plan pregnancy pregnant lactating .
